title: Welcome to the New Academic Year 2026-27
content: We are excited to welcome all students and staff back to school for the new academic year. Classes will resume from June 15th.

title: Staff Meeting regarding Curriculum Updates
content: A mandatory meeting for all teaching staff will be held in the main conference room regarding the new curriculum changes.

title: Grade 10 - Science Project Submission Deadline
content: Dear Students, the deadline for your science projects has been extended to July 20th. Please maximize this time.

title: School Bus Route Changes - Route #5
content: Due to road construction on MG Road, Route #5 will be diverted via Park Avenue. Pick-up times may be delayed by 10 minutes.

title: Inter-School Sports Competition Registration
content: Registration is now open for the Annual Sports Meet. Interested students can register with their Physical Education teachers.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Schedule - Term 1
content: The PTM for Term 1 will be held on September 15th from 9 AM to 1 PM. Slots will be assigned via email.

title: Diwali Vacation Dates
content: School will remain closed for Diwali vacation from Oct 28th to Nov 10th. Happy Diwali!

title: Urgent: Early Dismissal Today
content: Due to heavy rainfall warnings, school will be dismissed at 12:30 PM today. Buses will leave at 12:45 PM.

title: Library Books Return Reminder
content: All borrowed library books must be returned before the winter break begins.

title: Winter Uniform Policy
content: Students must start wearing winter uniforms (Full sleeves + Blazer) from Dec 1st. Order forms are available at reception.

title: Annual Day Cultural Program Auditions
content: Auditions for dance, drama, and music performances for the Annual Day will be held next week during lunch breaks.

title: Grade 5 - Field Trip to Science Center
content: A field trip is organized for Grade 5 students on Jan 20th. Consent forms have been sent with students.

title: Fees Reminder - 3rd Quarter
content: Kindly deposit the 3rd Quarter fees by Jan 31st to avoid late payment charges.

title: Republic Day Celebration
content: All students and parents are invited to the flag hoisting ceremony on Jan 26th at 8:00 AM.

title: Final Exam Schedule Released
content: The schedule for Final Exams starting in March has been published on the portal.

title: Canteen Maintenance
content: The school canteen will be closed for maintenance this Saturday. Please bring your own lunch.

title: Teacher Training Workshop
content: A workshop on 'AI in Education' will be conducted for all teaching staff on Mar 5th.

title: Admissions Open for 2027-28
content: Admissions for the next academic year are now open. Referrals from existing parents are welcome.

title: Urgent: Power Outage Notice
content: There will be a scheduled power outage in the school area tomorrow from 10 AM to 12 PM. Online systems may be intermittent.

title: Summer Camp Registration
content: Summer camp activities including swimming, robotics, and painting. Register by April 10th.
